Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan coach Jonathan Trott expressed confidence in his team's preparation and readiness for the match.
India coach Rahul Dravid praised Afghanistan's performance and highlighted the challenge posed by their bowling attack.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch in Barbados has offered some assistance to bowlers, with only one team crossing 200 runs so far.
Teams winning the toss have chosen to field first in all five games at the venue thus far.
The weather forecast predicts partial cloud cover and humid conditions during the day with no significant rain expected.
India command a 7-0 lead over Afghanistan in their eight T20 encounters, while one game ended in a 'no result'.
